text: Exploratorium is a 1974 American short documentary film about the Exploratorium science museum in San Francisco, produced by Jon Boorstin. The film explores the museum through imagery and sound, without voice-over. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short Subject. The film was preserved by the Academy Film Archive in 2013. ==See also== * List of American films of 1974 ==References== ==External links== * * Watch Exploratorium at the Exploratorium website. title: Exploratorium (film)
